/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on tentative determinations of eligibility for medical treatment based on prima facie evidence, including
requirements for determining prima facie eligibility
station of jurisdiction (SOJ) notification of an initial determination of prima facie eligibility
, and
processing notice of an initial determination of prima facie eligibility
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A - General Information on Eligibility for Medical Services
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A
